sentences: He has composed for film with credits including Jindabyne and the recently-released Netflix sci-fi feature I Am Mother for which he won the APRA/Screen Composerâ€™s Guild Award for Best Feature Film Score in 2019. .
Along with Paul Kelly, Katie Brianna and the Stormwater Boys he won the 2006 ARIA award  ARIA Award for Best Original Soundtrack, Cast or Show Album for their soundtrack to Jindabyne.
His older brother Peter Luscombe is also a musician: both were members of Paul Kelly and the Boon Companions from 2002 to 2007.
